ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Nerfs....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The mana cost needed to be increased.  I worked out a worst-case scenario explaining the song to my guild and was a bit puzzled when a 100% resist rate
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Apr 2000 kevikazzam@... wrote:
>
> Bewitching Bravura got its mana quadrupled in cost and maybe
> its max limit changed (hard to tell)

The mana cost needed to be increased. I worked out a
worst-case scenario explaining the song to my guild and was a
bit puzzled when a 100% resist rate (reapplication of the song
every 3 seconds) would take 8 minutes to deplete all my mana.
(Putting aside for the moment any arguments about whether we
should even be using mana.)

> That was to be expected but Selo's Accelandro and Selo's
> Song of Travel both got capped at 66% haste now...which is SLOWER than Spirit
> of Scale. Actually its not that much or a nerf and more of an insult heh.

I'm pretty sure the 75%/65% listed for us is without a drum.
From what I recall of the last spdata.eff parse, all our song
effects seemed to be listed sans instrument.

> The Druid and Shaman resistance spells (Circle of Summer,
> Circle of Winter etc) all got raised to increase resist by 45 instead of 40

Brings it in line with the high end enchanter MR buff. They
still can't touch us with a magical drum.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
